content:
support our new features and capabilities such as a personal assistant app, an augmented reality app, and a cryptocurrency wallet app. Additionally, we will also be providing an app marketplace and developer tools to allow third-party developers to build, test and deploy their AI-powered apps on our OS.

In summary, our new AI-enabled mobile operating system will be built on the solid foundation provided by the Linux kernel and the Android Open Source Project, while also incorporating advanced AI and ML capabilities, security and privacy features, and a user-friendly and intuitive interface inspired by iOS. We will be making updates and additions to the kernel layer, HAL, libraries and runtime, framework layer, and application framework layers to support our new features and capabilities, while providing a platform for developers to build AI-powered applications, which will provide a more personalized and seamless user experience.
